triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: Twitter is the primary data source for collecting tweets and analyzing public mood in the 2008 timeframe.

triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: Sentiment analysis is the core analytical technique used to extract mood information from tweet content.

triples.name: Psychometrics
triples.relevance: Psychometric instruments are used to extract and measure the six mood dimensions from aggregated Twitter content.

triples.name: Mood (psychology)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel six-dimensional mood vector framework for modeling collective public mood states.

triples.name: Microblogging
triples.relevance: Microblogging is the platform type that Twitter represents and through which public mood data is collected.

triples.name: Socioeconomic status
triples.relevance: The paper compares collective mood trends to existing socioeconomic indicators to assess predictive relationships.
